com.vaadin.addon.charts.model
Class PlotBand

java.lang.Object
  com.vaadin.addon.charts.model.AbstractConfigurationObject
      com.vaadin.addon.charts.model.PlotBand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PlotBand
extends AbstractConfigurationObject

A colored band stretching across the plot area marking an interval on the axis.

See Also:
